attributes.action: launch a full investigation into Haringey Social Services and to ensure that a case such as Baby P never happens again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I, like many thousands of other British Citizens, was traumatised by the story of Baby P and heartbroken that such an horrific series of events can occur in a supposedly civilised country.  Having a 6 month old baby myself, and knowing how infrequently I personally was visited by a health visitor, I believe the entire system needs reviewing as the attitude to child welfare by Social Services seems to be wholly inadequate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
